hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select --* b.f_billgive_date, --清单下达日期 d.f_mat_code, --物料编码 d.f_mat_name, --物料名称 count(1) f_batch_count_total, --总件数 count(case d.f_isenter when '1' then 1 end) as f_batch_count_y,--已确认“件”数 count(case d.f_isenter when '0' then 1 end) as f_batch_count_n, --未确认件数 sum(case d.f_isenter when '0' then d.f_quantity else 0 end) ||max(d.f_unit) as f_quantity --未确认总数 from t_bat_depot_iobill b, t_bat_depot_iodetail d where b.f_pid=d.f_bill_pid and b.f_sys_flag='1' --主表记录有效 and d.f_sys_flag='1' --子表记录有效 --and d.f_isenter='0' --“子表”未确认接受 and b.f_billgive_date is not null --日期不为空 and d.f_mat_code = ? and b.f_billgive_date >= ? and b.f_billgive_date <= ? group by b.f_billgive_date, d.f_mat_code, d.f_mat_name order by f_billgive_date desc

select --* b.f_billgive_date, --预约日期 d.f_mat_code, --物料编码 d.f_mat_name, --物料名称 d.f_mat_batch, --批次 (d.f_quantity || d.f_unit) as f_quantity --数量 from t_bat_depot_iobill b, t_bat_depot_iodetail d where b.f_pid=d.f_bill_pid and b.f_sys_flag='1' and d.f_sys_flag='1' and d.f_isenter='0' and b.f_billgive_date is not null and d.f_mat_code = ? and b.f_billgive_date= ? order by f_billgive_date desc
